comments.text:
Created attachment 573635
Rename ReportFailure to LogErrorWithError to match what it does better.
comments.author: jmuizelaar@mozilla.com

comments.creator: jmuizelaar@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 573636
Add some more error reporting
comments.author: jmuizelaar@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
Review of attachment 573636:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

It might be helpful to add some more context to the error messages.

::: gfx/layers/d3d10/LayerManagerD3D10.cpp
@@ +673,4 @@
>      // Strange! This shouldn't happen ... return a readback manager for this
>      // layer manager only.
>      mReadbackManager = new ReadbackManagerD3D10();
> +    gfx::LogFailure("Couldn't get device attachments for device."));

Extra ) here.
comments.creator: ajuma.bugzilla@alijuma.com

Comment on attachment 573635
Rename ReportFailure to LogErrorWithError to match what it does better.

Review of attachment 573635:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Description says LogErrorWithError instead of LogFailureWithError.

There are a few more calls to ReportFailure that will need to be changed to LogFailureWithError (two more in ImageLayerD3D10.cpp and one in ThebesLayerD3D10.cpp).
comments.author: ajuma.bugzilla@alijuma.com

comments.author: bas@basschouten.com
comments.text:
Comment on attachment 573635
Rename ReportFailure to LogErrorWithError to match what it does better.

Review of attachment 573635:
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Ah, when I read LogErrorwithErorr I was worried. I like LogFailureWithError :).

As Ali says there's some calls that this misses, I suspect this is because we added some calls recently and this was done against an old m-c.
comments.creator: bas@basschouten.com
